Name: Lovely Animal Stories
About the game: Lovely Animal Stories is a short game about cute animals. You have to pass 31 levels with simple tasks. Each level consists of a mini-game and a small scene about cute animals. Mini-games include: puzzles, mosaics, point and click, clicker and other genres. The game was inspired by great artists: @WAWAWICOMICS, @4AMSHOWER, @CATSCAFECOMICS, @jangandfox. Please visit their awesome Instagram profiles. Duration of the game: 20-30 minutes.
